CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( Part_of_a_package__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c,"Add-on") ),"Included",
IF( AND( Part_of_a_package__c = TRUE, ISPICKVAL(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c,"Integrations & Add-ons") ),"Integrations",
TEXT(PricebookEntry.Product2.Product_Type__c)))
CustomField.label: Conga Product Type
